column2: "Ya <%me>. Me? I'm taking a break. If you have time want to talk for a second?"
"Rest is needed in whatever you do. It may make whatever you're doing take longer."
"But it really doesn't matter what you find if your body isn't rested enough. Research is a lot like-"
"...hey chase him before he gets away!"
"What are you talking about taking breaks! Shut it! We have work to do!"
